  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83546</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83546</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Traction de la pesanteur selon la distance de la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Pull of gravity depending on the distance from the Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zug von Schwerkraft abhängig von dem Abstand von
der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tração da gravidade dependendo da distância da
terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tiro di gravità secondo la distanza dalla terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τράβηγμα της βαρύτητας ανάλογα με την απόσταση από τη
γη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tirón de la gravedad dependiendo de la distancia 
de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration compare la traction de la  pesanteur sur des fusées de l'espace de la NASA, une près de la  terre et l'autre loin de la terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the pull of gravity on NASA space rockets, one near the Earth and the other far from the Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la distance</string>
            <string language="en">distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pesanteur</string>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fusées de l'espace</string>
            <string language="en">space rockets</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht den Zug von 
Schwerkraft auf die NASA Platzraketen, einen nahe der Masse und den 
anderen weit von die Masse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara a tração da gravidade
em foguetes do espaço da NASA, uma perto da terra e a outra longe da 
terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta il tiro di 
gravità sui razzi dello spazio della NASA, uno vicino alla terra e 
l'altro lontano dalla terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει το τράβηγμα της βαρύτητας
στους διαστημικούς πυραύλους της NASA, της μιας κοντά στη γη και
άλλη μακριά από τη γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara el tirón de la gravedad
en los cohetes del espacio de la NASA, uno cerca de la tierra y el 
otro lejos de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Platzraketen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">distância</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gravidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">foguetes do espaço</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">distanza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gravità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">razzi dello spazio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απόσταση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βαρύτητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαστημικοί πύραυλοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">distancia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gravedad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cohetes del espacio</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
